fixes.name: Is specials ?
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Coll Spread] > SELECTEDVALUE('Specials spread'[Display As]),
    "Specials",
    "GC"
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF to DAX IF. Mapped [Coll Spread] to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Coll Spread] and replaced [Parameters].[Specials spread] with SELECTEDVALUE('Specials spread'[Display As]) as required for parameters. Preserved string literals "Specials" and "GC".
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
